Package com.peyrona.mingle.menu.core

Interface IProcessManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessManager, LinuxProcessManager, MacProcessManager, WinProcessManager
    public interface IProcessManager
    Interface for platform-specific process management. Each platform (Linux, macOS, Windows) will implement this interface to provide process listing and management functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IProcessManager.ProcessInfo  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Checks if the process manager is available on the current platform.

      • list

        java.util.List<IProcessManager.ProcessInfo> list()
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Scans for all running Mingle processes on the system
        Returns:
        List of Process objects representing Mingle processes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • kill

        boolean kill​(long pid,
             boolean forceful)
        Kills a process.
        Parameters:
        proc - The process to kill.
        forceful - If true, use SIGKILL (forceful), if false, use SIGTERM (graceful).
        Returns:
        The received process.

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable()
        Checks if the process manager is available on the current platform.
        Returns:
        true if the process manager is available, false otherwise
